<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/google-search-console/authorize/init"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Call this API to go to the login page of the Google Search Console.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"description":"The state to maintain after authorize.","in":"query","name":"state","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
